entry.title: Transifex administration
entry.summary: The sender, Felipe Micaroni Lalli, asks how he can gain status as a maintainer, admin, or reviewer on Transifex's Bitcoin project. Lalli seeks to set up the project description and logo to better attract contributors, using documentation from various sources to ensure accuracy. Additionally, Lalli wishes to review translations in Brazilian Portuguese, having already contributed to the project and completed 35% of missing translations. He includes his contact information and PGP ID in the signature.
